channel.title: Kbot closing
channel.description: Did anyone else hear that Kbot was closing on tuesday? Its sad cause that bot kicks ass... :(

item.title: Kbot closing
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:25, topic:343112”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=439511.msg3230364#msg3230364 date=1276009045]
Lol lin derepped me cause he/she thinks im a dumbass.
Sad.
[/quote]Lin is a he.[/quote]
I honestly dont give a fuck =\

Primadude:

Most botted accounts get caught in the end, so why bot? I used to bot, and had my account banned for a year. I haven’t used a bot since; I’d rather play the game fairly and not get banned, plus, personally I find the game more pleasurable if you earn your own skills and money - you feel like you’ve achieved something, rather than cheated to get them.

Still dont give a fuck…

[quote=“revengr, post:24, topic:343112”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=439511.msg3230364#msg3230364 date=1276009045]
Lol lin derepped me cause he/she thinks im a dumbass.
Sad.
[/quote]No one cares.[/quote]
Then stop commenting you fucking twat.

Davidi what the fuck did you mean you were going to rep++ me for what i did… What the fuck did i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Kbot closing
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Lin:

Oh no, a tool that does your work you’re too fucking lazy to do is closing! It’s people like you who kill the game. Why don’t you play the game like it was meant to be played? If you’re botting for money, then get off your ass and get a real job.

Sorry Lin, but you do realize this entire private server thing and moparscape actually forked off of a cheating community right? Everyone that wrote anything to do with private servers, at least in the beginning, was a cheater. (moparscape was a cheat client for regular runescape before private servers even existed) So, we like and support cheating around here. ;D

Read full topic

Most botted accounts get caught in the end, so why bot? I used to bot, and had my account banned for a year. I haven’t used a bot since; I’d rather play the game fairly and not get banned, plus, personally I find the game more pleasurable if you earn your own skills and money - you feel like you’ve achieved something, rather than cheated to get them.

item.title: Kbot closing
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:20, topic:343112”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=439511.msg3230165#msg3230165 date=1275971622]

If you have the patience to work for hours on end to get skills and cash needed to be considered anywhere near good at RuneScape, you should really try
something that can get you rewarded.
With the ability to work with that much determination, you have quite a bit of potential.

No, just no.
[/quote]It’s funny how you think you’re cool because some people disagree with people trying to actually make a point and support your original post. Why don’t you stop being so stuck-up for once?[/quote]
What the hell? I dont think im “cool” in any way so stfu.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Davidi2:

Actually skilling was fun when I was like 9, but now I hardly ever play, and when I do, it’s with a bot. (Unless I’m doing a quest or something)

Ah, skilling is still fun for me, just the quantity that i play runescape now is so limited that if i even want members to be remotely worth the 5.95 I have to bot. I probably play 4-6 hours a month, and maybe bot 10 or so.

item.title: Kbot closing
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:11, topic:343112”][quote author=Lin link=topic=439511.msg3229966#msg3229966 date=1275953745]
Oh no, a tool that does your work you’re too fucking lazy to do is closing!
[/quote]
[sarcasm]Ahh yes the horror, it breaks my heart.[/sarcasm]

It’s people like you who kill the game.

It is, imagine how lame life would be if you had to play Runescape for hundreds of hours just for a single 99.

Why don’t you play the game like it was meant to be played?

The game was meant to be played for fun, I doubt that grinding combat skills or skills in general for hours on end is fun.

If you’re botting for money, then get off your ass and get a real job.

Honestly if I was going to bot for cash, I would use paid bots.[/quote]
I like this guy O.O^

Read full topic

item.title: Kbot closing
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Lin:

Oh no, a tool that does your work you’re too fucking lazy to do is closing!

[sarcasm]Ahh yes the horror, it breaks my heart.[/sarcasm]

Lin:

It’s people like you who kill the game.

It is, imagine how lame life would be if you had to play Runescape for hundreds of hours just for a single 99.

Lin:

Why don’t you play the game like it was meant to be played?

The game was meant to be played for fun, I doubt that grinding combat skills or skills in general for hours on end is fun.

Lin:

If you’re botting for money, then get off your ass and get a real job.

Honestly if I was going to bot for cash, I would use paid bots.

Read full topic
